page.title: 09A FERNESS PUPIL'S DAY
page.content: I wake at about 6am when my dad gets up. He is a shepherd and we live on a small hill out in the country. There is only one house near us. I get up at 7am and have my breakfast. Afterwards I wash and dress. Between 8 and 9am I feed my rabbit Blackie and ride my bicycle. My school is 5 miles away. A car picks me up at the end of our road just after 9am. School begins at 9:30am. Because I live so far from school I have to stay for lunch. School finishes at 3:30pm and the car takes me home. I am an only child and none of my friends live near so I have to play by myself or help my dad until 6pm when we have our meal. I do my homework and watch TV until going to bed at 9pm.
